channel.title: Quick Question
channel.description:
I have a Zelda Four Swords Private Hamachi Server. I was just wondering if it would be ok to get some beta testers from here. I just finished up the coding so I want to try this out. Please get back to me.
[IMG]http://i344.photobucket.com/albums/p348/tekidder_2008/zelda-four-swords-adventures-b.jpg[/img]

item.title: Quick Question
item.dc:creator: @G-Maker G-Maker
item.description:
@G-Maker wrote:

[quote=“spy man47, post:5, topic:347725”][quote author=G-Maker link=topic=444110.msg3260937#msg3260937 date=1278478263]

This should me at General Programing Section…

Can I just post it on here so that I can go more into detail?
[/quote]

I think a mod will just move it…[/quote]

What about in that other general programing section?

Read full topic
